name: I love autumn flies...
description:
It all started with the fact that I decided to participate in 🍁 Great Autumn Game Jam: 2021 🍄. As you have already understood, the theme of the jam is autumn. I initially did not have any ideas. So I just entered it into the search and found quotes about autumn. Two of which I liked and I decided to implement. If you want to know what the meaning of this is, then it is not there.

"Control"

WASD

MOUSE
